About

Joni Trythall here, nice to (virtually) meet you. I’m busy launching friendly and impactful marketing sites for small businesses and nonprofits. I’ve worked remotely for nearly a decade and am currently based at the top-top of Delaware.

I spend most of my days communicating with the best clients, raising monarch butterflies and a human child, and failing to keep 10-foot-tall sunflowers upright.

ekgege gen eg uerhg ehrg

I’m passionate about transparent process, from initial sales outreach to a live project.
